recordId.title: recordId
recordId.description: The 18-character Salesforce record ID of the Account or Opportunity that the generated EmailMessage records should be associated with. This links the mock emails to the specific business record.

recordType.title: recordType
recordType.description: The Salesforce object type of the record to associate emails with. Must be 'Account' or 'Opportunity'. This determines how the EmailMessage records will be linked to the business record.

userRequest.title: userRequest
userRequest.description:
The user's natural language request describing what kind of mock emails to generate, including number of emails, timeframe, personas, and business context. 

Examples: 'Create 5 emails showing a B2B deal progression' or 'Generate 3 emails with Bobby Gibbs over 6 months'
